body:
Hello, over the past weeks I have been working on a custom/mash-up pack. I am still working on it, but I want people to give me their opinions on it.

The theme is based around this logo

I made the swords by myself :) They are 16x, so I didn't have much space to give them detail. I also added custom music, each music disc is a different song, 6 meme songs, and 6 songs I like :) Here's a video showcasing all the custom sounds. 

Pictures that showcase the pack: Pictures

Constructive criticism is welcomed, "It sucks" isn't much help.

ENJOY - Download (You need Winrar)

replies.body: HOLY CANOLY! looks good, mine is garbo compared to this considering I did it all by hand and didnt bother using the fancy tools. I also am doing everything to where it is meant to be 100% fps friendly so design for me is gonna be garbo xd at least players have a pack that they can use for avicus

replies.body: The swords are a perfect length and the particles are beautiful. Very nice sky too. Also the crosshair has a Lokigh approval (<--- that's a pretty prestigious statement.) Only negative thing is it might be a bit laggy but I'll have to try it out first.
